Original: <@RL,Erika,01>すご-い! やっぱリ ちがうわね!<CD>宇宙って かんじっ!
Translated: <@RL,Erika,01>Wow...! This is something else! It really makes you feel like you're in space!

Original: <@RL,Spyke,01>あねご あねご<CD>早く 行きましょうぜ!<CF><D1><@RL,Samantha,03>ガキじゃあるまいし<CD>はしゃいでるんじゃ ないわよぉ<CF><D1><@RL,Sloan,01>宇宙にも おふろ あるかな?
Translated: <@RL,Spyke,01>C'mon boss! Let's hurry!<CF><D1><@RL,Samantha,03>Stop frolicking around. You aren't a kid anymore.<CF><D1><@RL,Sloan,01>I wonder if they have any baths in space?

Original: <@RL,Koji,00>それにしても 何で やつらまで<CD>いるんだ?<CF><D1><@RL,Karin,05>みなさん そんなに ばらばらに<CD>なると まい子になって しまいます
Translated: <@RL,Koji,00>I'm still baffled about how they're coming with us?<CF><D1><@RL,Karin,05>Don't go off on your own. You're gonna get lost.

Original: <@RL,ProbablyHasANameBoy,01>だいじょうぶだよ<CD>まようほど 広くはない
Translated: <@RL,ProbablyHasANameBoy,01>Don't worry. This place isn't big enough for anyone to get lost in.

Original: <@RL,ProbablyHasANameBoy,01>ここは 宇宙ステ-ション<CD>「ランデブ-」だ<CF><D1>ちきゅうと 月の 中間点さ<CD>キミたちは ここから<CF><D1>月ヘ行くことになる<CD>右に行くと ホテルだ<CF><D1>キミたちの ヘやは とってあるから<CD>休むがいい<CF><D1>しゅっぱつの じゅんびが ととのい<CD>しだい むかえに来るから<CF><D1>いい子で まってるんだよ
Translated: <@RL,ProbablyHasANameBoy,01>This is space station <f02>Rendezvous<f00>.<CF>It's the midpoint between the Earth and the Moon.<CF><D1>This is where you'll be staying before heading to the moon.<CF><D1>The hotel is on the right side.<CF><D1>Your rooms have been pre-booked, so go and take a breather.<CF><D1>I'll come get you when everything's ready for departure.<CF><D1>Behave yourselves while you wait.

Original: <@RL,Koji,03>キザな やつ!<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,01>行こっ <&BUF03>!<CF><D1>ここまで来て 休むなんて<CD>もったいないわ<CF><D1><@RL,Koji,00>カリンは少し 休んでおけよ<CD>ヘやに 行こう
Translated: <@RL,Koji,03>What a snobby guy!<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,01>Let's go, <&BUF03>!<CF><D1>It's such a waste to rest in the hotel even though we're already in space!<CF><D1><@RL,Koji,00>You should take a rest though, Karin. So let's go to the hotel.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>ここから 宇宙ロケットに のれるんだ
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>So this is where the rocket that takes us to the moon is.

Original: <@RL,Lady2,00>コ-ヒ- こぼさないでね
Translated: <@RL,Lady2,00>Don't spill your coffee now.

Original: <@RL,Lady2,00>みなさ-ん! こういう時こそ<CD>あわてず さわがず こぼさずに!
Translated: <@RL,Lady2,00>Everyone! Now is not the time to panic, so no shouting, and please do not spill any coffee!

Original: <@RL,Lady2,00>ヤダ! コ-ヒ- こぼれちゃったわ
Translated: <@RL,Lady2,00>Just my luck! I spilled my coffee.

Original: <@RL,Lady2,00>いったい 何? 何の さわぎ?<CD>今ので コ-ヒ- こぼしちゃったわ
Translated: <@RL,Lady2,00>Huh? What just happened? I spilled my coffee due to that.

Original: <@RL,Man,00>あちっ! コ-ヒ- こぼれちゃったよ
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>I knocked my coffee over and got scalded.

Original: <@RL,Man,00>何か あったのかい?
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>What happened?

Original: <@RL,SelectCorpsGrunt,00>あ! コ-ヒ-こぼれたで あリます
Translated: <@RL,SelectCorpsGrunt,00>Ah nuts, my coffee fell over...

Original: <@RL,SelectCorpsGrunt,00>さわぎは おさまったようで あリます
Translated: <@RL,SelectCorpsGrunt,00>It appears that the ruckus has settled down.

Original: <@RL,Lady2,00>今日の お昼は 何にしようかしら
Translated: <@RL,Lady2,00>I wonder what I should have for lunch today.

Original: <@RL,Lady2,00>ねえ? 何か あったの?
Translated: <@RL,Lady2,00>Tell me, do you know what just happened?

Original: <@RL,Man,00>もう コンビニベんとうにも <CD>あきちゃったよ 毎日食ベてるもんな
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>I'm tired of eating convenience store lunches. They're the only thing I've been eating.

Original: <@RL,Man,00>何だか まずいことに なってるようだ<CD>あ ベんとうの ことじゃ ないよ
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>What a terrible sight to behold... Oh, I don't mean the lunch boxes to clarify.

Original: <@RL,Boy,00>うわ-! また まけちゃった
Translated: <@RL,Boy,00>Aww! I lost again!

Original: <@RL,Boy,00>何だよぉ! ほかに空いてるのが<CD>あるだろ! そっちで やれよ!<CF><D1>それとも ゲ-ムのル-ルでも<CD>聞きたいのか?<*04>
Translated: <@RL,Boy,00>What? There are still so many spots! Go stand over there instead!<CF><D1>Or what, do you want to hear the game rules?<*04>

Original: <@RL,Boy,00>ゲ-ムは2つ「ジャンプで ゴ-ル」と<CD>「セレクト隊 ききいっぱつ!」だ<CF><D1>「ジャンプで ゴ-ル」の<CD>ル-ルを 聞く?<*04>
Translated: <@RL,Boy,00>There are 2 games: <f02>Jump 'Til Goal<f00> and <f02>Select Corps by a Hair's Breadth!<f00>.<CF><D1>Do you want to hear the rules for <f02>Jump 'Til Goal<f00>?<*04>

Original: <@RL,Boy,00>「ジャンプで ゴ-ル」は<CF><D1>リゅうぼくの上にある メダルを<CD>ひろうのが もくてきだ!<CF><D1>メダルを 全部 あつめると<CF><D1>「ピ-の ぬいぐるみ」ってのが<CD>出てくるんだ!<CF><D1>そいつを ひろうと<CD>ゲ-ムクリアだぜ!<CF><D1>じゅうじキ-で プレイヤ-を動かして<CD>Aボタンで 木と木の間をジャンプ!<CF><D1>川におちたリ 時間切れになったら<CD>アウトだぜ!
Translated: <@RL,Boy,00>In <f02>Jump 'Til Goal<f00>, you aim is to get the Medals on the drifting woods!<CF><D1>If you can collect everything, you'll get the <f02>Pii's Plushie<f00> as a prize!<CF><D1>Use the control pad to move, and press the A button to jump one wood to another!<CF><D1>You lose if you fall into the river or run out of time!

Original: <@RL,Boy,00>「セレクト隊 ききいっぱつ!」の<CD>ル-ルを 聞く?<*04>
Translated: <@RL,Boy,00>Do you want to hear the rules for <f02>Select Corps by a Hair's Breadth!<f00>?<*04>

Original: <@RL,Boy,00>イカダに のった セレクト隊を<CD>うまく あやつって<CF><D1>上から水を おとしてくる ロボロボ団<CD>を ファイア-攻撃で やっつけろ!<CF><D1>大きな水玉をこわすと たまに<CD>アイテムが 出てくるぜ!<CF><D1>ロボロボ団を 10人たおす前に<CD>水が 画面の上まできたら アウトだ!<CF><D1>じゅうじキ-で 左右にいどうして<CD>Aボタンで ファイア-攻撃!
Translated: <@RL,Boy,00>You play as the Select Corp battling the Rubberobo Gang!<CF><D1>Watch out as you shoot them since they will drop water on you from above!<CF><D1>You can potentially obtain items by destroying the big bubbles!<CF><D1>You lose if your screen has been drowned in water! Defeat 10 Rubberobo Gang members before that happens!<CF><D1>Use the control pad to move left or right, and press the A button to fire!

Original: <@RL,Boy,00>...ま とリあえず やってみろよ!
Translated: <@RL,Boy,00>...Anyway, just try it out!

Original: <@RL,Boy,00>何が おきようと おれは 勝つまで<CD>ゲ-ムを やるんだ-!
Translated: <@RL,Boy,00>No matter what happens, I'll keep playing until I win!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>「ちょうせい中」だってさ
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>It says it's <f02>Out of Service.

Original: <@RL,SelectCorpsGrunt,00>ここは セレクト隊 ランデブ-しぶで<CD>あリます
Translated: <@RL,SelectCorpsGrunt,00>This is the Select Corps' Rendezvous Branch.

Original: <@RL,SelectCorpsGrunt,03>きんきゅう じたいで あリます!
Translated: <@RL,SelectCorpsGrunt,03>This is an emergency!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,01>これは 「ジャンプで ゴ-ル」だ<CD>1回 200¥で あそぼう!<*04>
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,01>I can play <f02>Jump 'Til Goal<f00> here. It's ¥200 to play for a round!<*04>

Original: <@LL,Ikki,03>まけちゃった...
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,03>I lost...

Original: <@LL,Ikki,05>お金が ないや...
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,05>I don't have enough money...

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>やっぱリ いいや
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>Never mind.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,01>「セレクト隊 ききいっぱつ!」だ<CD>1回 300¥で あそぼう!<*04>
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,01>I can play<f02> Select Corps by a Hair's Breadth!<f00>. It's ¥300 to play for a round!<*04>

Original: <@LL,Ikki,03>まけちゃった...
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,03>I lost...

Original: <@LL,Ikki,05>お金が ないや...
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,05>I don't have enough money...

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>やっぱリ いいや
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>Never mind.

Original: <@RL,MultiLeggedMedabot,00>あ ちょっと まってて<CD>きみの ヘや そうじ中だから
Translated: <@RL,MultiLeggedMedabot,00>Oh, please wait for a bit longer. Your room is currently being cleaned.

Original: <@RL,MultiLeggedMedabot,00>きみのヘやのそうじ 今 おわったから
Translated: <@RL,MultiLeggedMedabot,00>Your room has been cleaned.

Original: <@RL,Koji,01>ここでは どんなロボトルが<CD>おれを まってるんだ!?
Translated: <@RL,Koji,01>I wonder what kind of robattles are awaiting me here!?

Original: <@RL,Koji,03>ほんとに お前は 頭に ちが<CD>のぼると 貝さかいが なくなるな<CF><D1>もう少し 考えて 行動しろよ!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>コウジに 言われた...
Translated: <@RL,Koji,03>You tend to get reckless when your adrenaline rushes.<CF><D1>You need think more before you act!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>I was told off by Koji of all people...

Original: <@RL,Koji,01>お おい 今のほうそう きいたか!?
Translated: <@RL,Koji,01>H-hey, did you hear that announcement just now!?

Original: <@RL,Karin,04>ちょっと お休みです
Translated: <@RL,Karin,04>I'm taking a short break.

Original: <@RL,Karin,05>何か あったのでしょうか?
Translated: <@RL,Karin,05>Did something happen?

Original: <@RL,Karin,04><&BUF03>くんも<CD>アリカさんも ぶじで よかったわ
Translated: <@RL,Karin,04><&BUF03>, Erika, thank goodness you're both alright.

Original: <@RL,Erika,01>楽しかったね 宇宙ゆうえい!
Translated: <@RL,Erika,01>Space swimming is so much fun!

Original: <@RL,Samantha,00>何よぉ 今 つかれてるんだからさぁ<CD>話しかけないでくれる?
Translated: <@RL,Samantha,00>What... I'm tired right now. Can you not talk to me right now?

Original: <@RL,Samantha,00>何よぉ 用がなかったら<CD>どっか 行ってよねぇ<CF><D1><@RL,Samantha,03>スクリュ-ズに 入リたくなったんなら<CD>話 聞かなくも ないけどさぁ<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>入らないって...
Translated: <@RL,Samantha,00>What... Screw off if you don't need anything from me.<CF><D1><@RL,Samantha,03>But if you want to join the Screws, I guess I don't mind lending an ear.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>I'm not joining the Screws, alright?

Original: <@RL,Spyke,04>何で おれと カガミヤマだけ<CD>ヘやが いっしょなんだ?
Translated: <@RL,Spyke,04>Why are Sloan and I the only ones who have to share a room?

Original: <@RL,Spyke,04>お <&BUF03><CD>元気で なによリだな<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>お前らの せいで くろうが ふえたよ
Translated: <@RL,Spyke,04>Oh <&BUF03>, glad to see you're doing well.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>No thanks to you. I already have enough on my plate as is.

Original: <@RL,Sloan,00>おふろに入って さっぱリしたいな
Translated: <@RL,Sloan,00>I want to take a bath and refresh myself.

Original: <@RL,Sloan,01>さっきは あリがとね<CD><&BUF03><CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,06>うっ! やけに すなおだなあ
Translated: <@RL,Sloan,01>Thanks for earlier, <&BUF03>.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,06>Ugh! Why does he have to be so sincere?

Original: <@RL,Man,00>うっぷ ポッドにのってたら<CD>気分が わるくなってしまった
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>Urp... I'm feeling sick after riding the pod.

Original: <@RL,Boy,00>ここで くらしてるっていうのは<CD>すっごく カッコイイんだけど<CF><D1>1か月おくれでしか ボンボンが<CD>とどかないのが 玉にキズってやつ?
Translated: <@RL,Boy,00>It's really cool living here.<CF><D1>But, we always get BomBom 1 month late. The grass is always greener, I guess?

Original: <@RL,Boy,00>この メダなんとかって アニメ<CD>おもしろいんだぜ
Translated: <@RL,Boy,00>This Meda-something anime is really interesting.

Original: <@RL,Girl,00>テレビを 貝るんだったら<CF><D1>2メ-トルいじょう はなれないとね
Translated: <@RL,Girl,00>Remember to be at least 2 meters away when you're watching the TV.

Original: <@RL,OldLady,00>ロボトルをすると 元気が出るんじゃよ
Translated: <@RL,OldLady,00>Robattles give me energy.

Original: <@RL,OldLady,00>わかがえった 気分じゃわい
Translated: <@RL,OldLady,00>They make me feel young again.

Original: <@RL,Lady2,00>このヘや 台所が どこにも ないの
Translated: <@RL,Lady2,00>This room doesn't have a kitchen.

Original: <@RL,Man,00>おじさんのメダロット 知らない?<CF><D1>買いものに行くまでは ここにいたんだ
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>Do you know where my Medabot is?<CF><D1>It was here before I went shopping.

Original: <@RL,Lady2,00>こわいわぁ どうして おとなリさんが<CD>わたしの ヘやに いるのよ
Translated: <@RL,Lady2,00>Scary... What's my neighbor doing in my room?

Original: <@RL,FloatingMedabot,00>ごしゅじんさま かえって来ません
Translated: <@RL,FloatingMedabot,00>My master isn't home.

Original: <@RL,Man,00>ここは 宇宙とし 「ランデブ-」<CF><D1>「テラカドくん」も この 近くに<CD>うかんでるんだ
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>This is <f02>Rendezvous<f00>, the space city.<CF><D1><f02>Little Terakado<f00> is floating nearby.

Original: <@RL,Erika,01>あ <&BUF03>! ここって<CD>宇宙ゆうえいが 出来るんだって!<CF><D1>早く 行こっ!
Translated: <@RL,Erika,01>Oh, <&BUF03>! Apparently, we can swim in space!<CF><D1>Let's go!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,07>ああ まってよ アリカ!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,07>Okay. Wait for me, Erika!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,04>ふ-ん 宇宙ゆうえい かぁ<CD>ぼくも 行ってみよう
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,04>Hm... Space swimming? I'll go and take a look.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,04>宇宙ゆうえいって たしか 今<CD>きんしだったんじゃ...?<CF><D1>とリあえず ぼくも 行ってみよう
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,04>Isn't space swimming prohibited at the moment...?<CF><D1>Anyway, I should go take a look.

Original: <@RL,FemaleMedabot,00>ここからポッドで 宇宙に行けますよ
Translated: <@RL,FemaleMedabot,00>You can go to space by using one of the pods.

Original: <@RL,FemaleMedabot,00>今は ポッドのリ場に 近づいちゃ<CD>だめよ
Translated: <@RL,FemaleMedabot,00>You can't go near the Pod Station at the moment.

Original: <@RL,Samantha,02>ちょっとくらい いいじゃなぁい!<CF><D1><@RL,Spyke,02>そ-だ そ-だ!<CF><D1><@RL,Sloan,02>あ-だ こ-だ!<CF><D1><@RL,Sailor,00>だめだめ 今は!<CF><D1>ランデブ-に 入リこんだっていう<CD>あやしいやつらが つかまらないとな<CF><D1><@RL,Spyke,04>ちぇ- やってらんね-よな!<CF><D1><@RL,Samantha,00>もう いいわよぉ イワノイ<CD>次の手を 考えるのよぉ<CF><D1><@RL,Spyke,03>...分かリやした<CD>まかせて ください!
Translated: <@RL,Samantha,02>Why not!? It's just for a little while!<CF><D1><@RL,Spyke,02>That's right!<CF><D1><@RL,Sloan,02>Over here guys!<CF><D1><@RL,Sailor,00>No, you can't go there!<CF><D1>We need to catch the suspicious bunch who sneaked into Rendezvous.<CF><D1><@RL,Spyke,04>Tch! Boring!<CF><D1><@RL,Samantha,00>Knock it off, Spyke. We need to think of our next move.<CF><D1><@RL,Spyke,03>...A'ight. Please leave it to me!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,05>あいつら ここまで来て<CD>さわぎを おこさなきゃ いいけど
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,05>I hope they didn't come all the way here just to cause another problem.

Original: <@RL,Erika,05>え-っ! せっかく宇宙に来たのに<CF><D1>どうして 宇宙ゆうえいが<CD>できないわけぇ?<CF><D1><@RL,Sailor,00>セレクト隊から<CD>きんしされているんだ<CF><D1>あやしい れんちゅうが<CD>入リこんでるって 話でな<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,06>なっとくできないっ!<CD>セレクト隊に もんく 言ってくる
Translated: <@RL,Erika,05>What!? I came all the way to space, and you're saying that I can't swim!?<CF><D1><@RL,Sailor,00>It's an order from the Select Corp.<CF><D1>Apparently, there's a suspicious bunch who are trespassing.<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,06>I can't accept this! I'm filing a complaint to the Select Corp.

Original: <@RL,Erika,02>そこ! どいてよっ!
Translated: <@RL,Erika,02>Hey! Move aside!

Original: <@RL,Sailor,00>セレクト隊が あやしいやつらを<CD>つかまえるまで ここは 通せねぇよ
Translated: <@RL,Sailor,00>I can't let you pass before all the suspicious individuals are arrested.

Original: <@RL,Sailor,00>大変だ! 大変だ!
Translated: <@RL,Sailor,00>There's bad news!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,06>お おちついてください!<CD>ど ど-したんですかっ!!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,06>P-please calm down! W-what's happened!?

Original: <@RL,Sailor,00>大変だ! 3人租の 子どもたちが<CD>どさくさに まぎれて<CF><D1>ポッドに のって行っちまった!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,07>いっ!? それって<CD>スクリュ-ズ!?<CF><D1><@RL,Sailor,00>おいかけようにも ポッドがない!<CD>あああ どうしようっ!?
Translated: <@RL,Sailor,00>It's terrible! Three children rode in the pod during the confusion!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,07>Oh no, it might be the Screws!<CF><D1><@RL,Sailor,00>Without any other pods, we can't go after them! Aah... What do we do now!?

Original: <@RL,SelectCorpsGrunt,00>ぐう ぐう ねむってないで あリます<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>たったまま ねてる
Translated: <@RL,SelectCorpsGrunt,00><f08>Zzzz... Zzzz...<f00> I'm not sleeping.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>He's sleeping while standing.

Original: <@RL,SelectCorpsGrunt,00>「テラカドくん」は われわれの<CD>かつやくで ぶじで あリます!<CF><D1>少年も しょうらいは セレクト隊に<CD>入るで あリますか?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,06>け けっこうです!
Translated: <@RL,SelectCorpsGrunt,00><f02>Little Terakado<f00> is safe due to our efforts!<CF><D1>Would you like to join the Select Corp when you grow older?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,06>N-no thank you!

Original: <@RL,SelectCorpsGrunt,00>きっ きんきゅうじたいで あリます!
Translated: <@RL,SelectCorpsGrunt,00>T-this is an emergency!

Original: <@RL,Erika,02>宇宙ゆうえいの きんしを<CD>とリけしてっ!<CF><D1><@RL,SelectCorpsGrunt,00>そういうわけには<CD>いかないで あリます!
Translated: <@RL,Erika,02>Lift the ban on space swimming!<CF><D1><@RL,SelectCorpsGrunt,00>We can't do that!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>宇宙ゆうえいも きんしだし<CD>やることないから<CF><D1>とリあえず ヘやでテレビでも 貝るか
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>With space swimming banned, there's nothing much to do.<CF><D1>So I'll go back to my room and watch some TV.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>「今日の テラカドくん」を 貝よう
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>I'm gonna watch <f02>Today's Little Terakado<f00>.

What are you saying?<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,07>It's on TV!<CF><D1>There was a UFO flying from Earth to the moon!<CF><D1>It's appearing in headlines all over Earth!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>Seriously?<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,07>I'm serious!<CF><D1>Also, Dr. Armond was conditionally released in response to this emergency!<CF><D1>He's coming to the moon in his own rocket to defeat the aliens with the power of science!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,07>ヘっ ヘベレケはかせっ!?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>思えば 1年前...<CD>「せかいの ギャルに もてたい!」<CF><D1>って リゆうで せかいせいふくを<CD>たくらんだ おじいさんだったよな<CF><D1>ずのうだけは 天才てき だったけど<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,02>何 1人で ぶつぶつ 言ってるの?<CF><D1>とにかく もんだいは あたしたちも<CD>月で ヘベレケはかせと<CF><D1>UFOにのった 宇宙人に<CD>会うってことよ!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>いや あれは 宇宙人じゃなくて<CD>ロボロボ団...<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,07>あ-もうっ<CD>じっと してらんないっ!<CF><D1>あたし むこうで ユウキさんが<CD>来るの まっとくわ!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,07>D-D-Dr. Armond!?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>Come to think of it, it's been one year since then.<CF><D1>He plotted to rule the world over a year ago just because he wanted to be popular with babes around the world.<CF><D1>That old man's a genius, but...<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,02>What are you doing, muttering to yourself?<CF><D1>Anyway, we need to see Dr. Armond and the aliens in that UFO!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>Actually, they're the Rubberobo Gang, not aliens.<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,07>Urgh, jeez! I still can't sit around doing nothing!<CF><D1>I'll head over and wait for Mr. Yuki!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,02>ロボロボ団が 月に!?<CD>また何か たくらんでるな!<CF><D1>こうしちゃ いられない!<CF><D1>ぼくも アリカといっしょに<CD>ユウキさんが 来るのを まとう!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,02>The Rubberobo Gang went to the moon!? What are they plotting this time!?<CF><D1>I need to do something!<CF><D1>I'll go wait for Mr. Yuki with Erika!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,06>こっちには 用は ないよ
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,06>There's nothing to do here.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,06>どっ どうしたんですか!?<CF><D1><@RL,SelectCorpsGrunt,03>メダロットえいせい「テラカドくん」が<CF><D1>ロボロボに ほかくされたで<CD>あリます!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,07>「テラカドくん」って言ったら!<CF><D1><@RL,SelectCorpsGrunt,03>ロボトルが こうせいに 行われるよう<CD>宇宙から かんししている<CF><D1>じゅうような えいせいで あリます<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,07>大変だ!<CF><D1><@RL,SelectCorpsGrunt,03>いそぐで あリます!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,06>W-what happened!?<CF><D1><@RL,SelectCorpsGrunt,03><f02>Little Terakado<f00>, the Medabot satellite has been taken over by the Rubberobo Gang!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,07><f02>Little Terakado<f00>? Isn't that--<CF><D1><@RL,SelectCorpsGrunt,03>It has a vital role to monitor all robattles from space and ensure that they are being held fairly.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,07>That's terrible!<CF><D1><@RL,SelectCorpsGrunt,03>We need to hurry!

Original: <@RL,Sailor,00>大変だ! 大変だ!<CF><D1>ほかにも どさくさにまぎれて<CD>宇宙に行った人がいたら どうしよ-<CF><D1>ポッドが ないから おいかけられない
Translated: <@RL,Sailor,00>There's bad news!<CF><D1>There could be people who went to space during the confusion...<CF><D1>But we can't go after them without any pods.

Original: <@RL,Sailor,00>いちじは どうなるかと 思ったけど<CF><D1>まあ みんな ぶじで よかった
Translated: <@RL,Sailor,00>I was worried for a second there.<CF><D1>Thank goodness you're all safe.

Original: <@RL,Sailor,00>今は あぶないから 近づいちゃだめ!<CF><D1><@RL,Koji,01>ロボロボの れんちゅうを<CD>止めるんだ 通してくれ!
Translated: <@RL,Sailor,00>You can't get in! It's dangerous here at the moment.<CF><D1><@RL,Koji,01>Please let me pass! I'm here to stop the Rubberobo Gang!

Original: <@RL,Sailor,00>ロボロボ団が いなくなったから<CF><D1>ポッドにのっても いいよ
Translated: <@RL,Sailor,00>You can ride the pod when the Rubberobo Gang is gone.

Original: <@RL,Koji,01>そこを どいてくれ!<CF><D1><@RL,Sailor,00>ここは セレクト隊にまかせて きみは<CD>あんぜんな 所ヘ ひなんしなさい
Translated: <@RL,Koji,01>Please move aside!<CF><D1><@RL,Sailor,00>Leave this matter to the Select Corp. You should evacuate to a safe place.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>ロッカ-の中に<CD>宇宙ふくが 入ってる<CF><D1>...よし! これを きて<CD>外に出よう
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>There's a spacesuit in the locker.<CF><D1>...Alright! I'll go outside in this.

Original: <@RL,MultiLeggedMedabot,00>よろしければ ここからランデブ-内の<CD>ポッドのリばに ごあんないします
Translated: <@RL,MultiLeggedMedabot,00>I can guide you to the pod center in Rendezvous if you wish.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>もうちょっと たんさく してからね
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>After I take a look around for a bit more.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>いざって時の ために<CD><&BUF07>を 転送しとこう
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>I'll transport <&BUF07> in case anything happens.

Original: <@RL,Metabee,00>な 何だ? ここ<CD>おっとっとっと...
Translated: <@RL,Metabee,00>W-what's with this place? Whoa whoa whoa...

Original: <@RL,Rokusho,00>何だ? ここは<CD>...おっと
Translated: <@RL,Rokusho,00>What's with this place? ...Whoa there.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>だ だいじょうぶ?<CF><D1><@RL,Metabee,00>体が ふわふわして<CD>変な かんじだ<CF><D1>それに パ-ツが こおリつきそうな<CD>さむさだ
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>A-are you okay?<CF><D1><@RL,Metabee,00>My body feels light. It's very strange.<CF><D1>Also, my Parts are going to freeze with how cold it is.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>だ だいじょうぶ?<CF><D1><@RL,Rokusho,00>うまく 体の バランスが とれない<CD>それに さむいな ここは
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>A-are you okay?<CF><D1><@RL,Rokusho,00>It's hard for me to stand upright. Also, it's quite cold here.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>今の内に 宇宙に なれといてよ<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,04><&BUF03>!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>Use this chance to get used to being in space.<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,04><&BUF03>!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,07>あれっ!? その声 アリカ!<CD>...と ブラス?<CF><D1><@RL,FemaleMedabot,00>こんにちは <&BUF03>さん<CD><&BUF07>さん<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,04><&BUF03>も きっと<CD>来ると思って まってたのよ!<CF><D1>スクリュ-ズや セレクト隊に<CD>おくれは とれないもんね!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>ところで アリカ<CF><D1>ブラスに 宇宙ふくは<CD>いらないんじゃないの?<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,00>そう? ま いいわ<CD>それはそうと<CF><D1>ここを ずっと 左に行くと<CD>道が さらに つづいてるんだけど<CF><D1>まずは 上と下に 道が あるから<CD>手分けして たんさくしましょ<CF><D1>あたし 下に 行くから<CD>あんたは 上ね!<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,04>ぐるっと回れば うらっかわで<CD>ごうリゅうできる はずよ!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,07>Huh!? Erika!? ...And Brass, too?<CF><D1><@RL,FemaleMedabot,00>Hello, Mr. <&BUF03> and Mr. <&BUF07>.<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,04>I was waiting for you since I was sure you would come, <&BUF03>!<CF><D1>We can't afford to lag behind the Screws and Select Corp!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>Erika, does Brass even need to wear a spacesuit?<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,00>She doesn't? Well, whatever.<CF><D1>We're gonna find more paths if we keep going left from here.<CF><D1>First, let's split up at the top and bottom paths.<CF><D1>I'll head to the bottom area, so the top one is yours!<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,04>Let's group up on the side of the moon!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,06>ポッドのほかに 外に出る ほうほう<CD>ないかな?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,07>そうだ! 宇宙ふくだ! 宇宙ふくが<CD>あれば 外に出られるかも!?
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,06>Is there a way for me to go outside without a pod?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,07>That's it! A spacesuit! I should be able to go out if I wear one!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>こっちは アリカに まかせよう
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>I should leave this area to Erika.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>アリカと ごうリゅう しないと
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>I need to meet up with Erika.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>ポッドだ
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>It's a pod.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,07>あ! ロボロボ団!<CF><D1><@RL,RubberRoboGrunt,04>ロボッ!?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,02>お前らの たくらみを<CD>あらいざらい 聞き出してやる!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,07>Ah! It's the Rubberobo Gang!<CF><D1><@RL,RubberRoboGrunt,04>Robo!?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,02>I'll make you spill all the schemes that you're plotting!

Original: <@RL,RubberRoboGrunt,00>ここで つかまるわけには<CD>行かないロボ!
Translated: <@RL,RubberRoboGrunt,00>No way I'm letting you catch me here, robo!

Original: <@RL,RubberRoboGrunt,01>こっこまっで お-いで-ロボ!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,02>宇宙ふくじゃ あそこまで 行けない!<CD>ずるいぞっ!
Translated: <@RL,RubberRoboGrunt,01>Come get me if you can, robo!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,02>I can't get there with only a spacesuit! That's cheating!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,05>宇宙ふくじゃ<CD>これいじょう すすめない<CF><D1>じゃあ むこうがわに<CD>ぐるっと回るのは むリってことか<CF><D1>いったん 引きかえして<CD>アリカの方を 貝に行こう
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,05>I can't go past here with only a spacesuit.<CF><D1>That means I can't go around the moon from here.<CF><D1>I should go back and find Erika.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,05>それにしても ロボロボ団のふくって<CD>宇宙ふくの かわリにも なるのか<CF><D1>変なとこだけ ちゃんとしてるなぁ
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,05>Still, I didn't expect that the Rubberobo's suits can also be used a spacesuit.<CF><D1>They're thorough in strange places.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,07>あ! ロボロボ団!<CF><D1><@RL,RubberRoboGrunt,04>ロボッ!?
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,07>Ah! It's the Rubberobo Gang!<CF><D1><@RL,RubberRoboGrunt,04>Robo!?

Original: <@RL,RubberRoboGrunt,01>こっこまっで お-いで-ロボ!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,02>またっ!
Translated: <@RL,RubberRoboGrunt,01>Come get me if you can, robo!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,02>Not again!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>それにしても アリカ<CD>いないなぁ 先に 行ったのかな?<CF><D1>手がかリもないし<CD>ぼくも 先ヘ行こう
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>Still, where's Erika? Did she go on ahead?<CF><D1>I've got no clue. So I guess I should head there myself.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>こっちは カガミヤマに まかせよう
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>I should leave this area to Sloan.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,06>わっ! ど どうしたんだっ!?<CF><D1><@RL,Sloan,03>う-ん...<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,07>その声 カガミヤマ!<CF><D1><@RL,Sloan,03>ここは だれ?<CD>ぼくは どこ?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,06>しっかリしろっ!<CD>何が あったんだ?<CF><D1><@RL,Sloan,03>ぼくが のってた ポッド<CD>ロボロボに とられた<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,07>何だって!<CD>じゃ キクヒメと イワノイは!?<CF><D1><@RL,Sloan,03>分からない たくさん メダロットが<CD>出てきて...<CF><D1>ぼく あんまリ びっくリすることが<CD>あると 気を うしなっちゃうから<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>そういうのって かわいい女の子の<CD>セリフだと 思うんだけどなぁ<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>まあ いいや ぼく キクヒメと<CD>イワノイを さがしてみる<CF><D1><@RL,Sloan,00>ぼくも...<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>じゃ 手分けして さがそう<CD>お前は上! ぼくは下!<CF><D1><@RL,Sloan,00>分かった
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,06>Woah! W-what happened!?<CF><D1><@RL,Sloan,03>Uh...<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,07>It's Sloan!<CF><D1><@RL,Sloan,03>Who am this place? Where is I?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,06>Get a grip! What happened?<CF><D1><@RL,Sloan,03>The Rubberobo took my pod.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,07>What!? What about Samantha and Spyke!?<CF><D1><@RL,Sloan,03>I don't know... Suddenly, there were so many Medabots...<CF><D1>I pass out easily if I get surprised too many times at once.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>That kind of thing should be reserved for cute girls, you know?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>Oh well, I'll go find Samantha and Spyke.<CF><D1><@RL,Sloan,00>Me, too...<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>Then let's split up. You go up! I'll go down!<CF><D1><@RL,Sloan,00>Okay.

Original: <@RL,Erika,07><&BUF03>!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>あれ? アリカ そんな所で<CD>何やってんの?<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,06>すきで ここに<CD>いるんじゃ ないわよ!<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,05>ロボロボ団と ロボトルやって<CD>まけちゃって ここに おきざリよ<CF><D1>ブラスも とられちゃって...<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>まさか アリカ ブラスに<CD>宇宙ふく きせたまま<CF><D1>ロボトルさせたんじゃあ...<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,05>うん...<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>あちゃ-<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>何とか ロボロボ団から ポッドを<CD>うばいかえして たすけに来るから<CF><D1>そこで まってて!<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,05>あんまリ またせないでよ?
Translated: <@RL,Erika,07><&BUF03>!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>Huh? What are you doing over there?<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,06>It's not like I want to be here, either!<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,05>I lost a robattle with the Rubberobo Gang, and they left me here.<CF><D1>They took Brass with them...<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>Erika, did you let Brass fight while wearing a spacesuit?<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,05>Yeah...<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>That's why...<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>I'm gonna take back the pod from the Rubberobo Gang and rescue you.<CF><D1>Just sit tight!<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,05>Don't make me wait too long, okay?

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>カ カガミヤマ?<CF><D1><@RL,Sloan,03>う-ん...
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>S-Sloan?<CF><D1><@RL,Sloan,03>Uh...

Original: <@RL,Sloan,03>きみは どこ? ぼくは 何?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>お前な-<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>キクヒメたちは どうしたんだよ?<CF><D1><@RL,Sloan,00>ポッド とリかえした<CD>でも あねごたち いなかった<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>ポッド あったんだ<CD>でも 何でまた 気ぜつしてたの?<CF><D1><@RL,Sloan,03>ポッドに のってたら<CF><D1>上と 下が 分からないから<CD>気持ちわるく なった<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>う-む...<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>じゃ このポッド<CD>ぼくが 使っても いいかな?<CF><D1><@RL,Sloan,01>いいよ ぼく ここで まってる
Translated: <@RL,Sloan,03>Where am you? What are I?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>Seriously?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>Where's Samantha and Spyke?<CF><D1><@RL,Sloan,00>I managed to take back the pod. But they weren't in it, though.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>Oh, so you found it. How come you passed out again though?<CF><D1><@RL,Sloan,03>When I rode the pod, I couldn't tell what was up and what was down.<CF><D1>It made me feel sick.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>Hm...<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>Can I use this pod then?<CF><D1><@RL,Sloan,01>Sure, I'll wait here.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>これがあれば 宇宙も らくらくだ
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>With this, traveling through space is easy peasy.

Original: <@RL,Sloan,01>星が きれいだね
Translated: <@RL,Sloan,01>The stars are beautiful, aren't they?

Original: <@RL,RubberRoboGrunt,00>女の子は そっちじゃ ないロボ
Translated: <@RL,RubberRoboGrunt,00>The girl isn't here, robo.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,04>アリカを ほおって<CD>かえるわけには いかないよな<CF><D1>ついでに オマケの スクリュ-ズもね
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,04>I can't just leave Erika here.<CF><D1>And the Screws, as well.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,04>さあ アリカを ひろってかえろう!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,04>Let's get Erika and go home!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,07>あれ? アリカが いない!<CD>ここで まってろって言ったのに
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,07>Huh? Where's Erika!? I told her to wait for me.

Original: <@RL,Metabee,00>っていうかさ- もんだいは<CD>どうやって ここから<CF><D1>出てったかって ことじゃね-のかよ?
Translated: <@RL,Metabee,00>More like, how did she get out of here in the first place?

Original: <@RL,Rokusho,00>もんだいは どうやって<CD>ここから 出て行ったかと<CF><D1>いうことでは ないのか?
Translated: <@RL,Rokusho,00>Shouldn't the question be, how did she escape on her own?

Original: <@LL,Ikki,02>こんな所で 何やってんの?

Original: <@RL,ProbablyHasANameBoy,01>おや? キミたち もしかして<CD>ボクを まってたのかい?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,06>う 宇宙ロケットはっ!?<CF><D1><@RL,ProbablyHasANameBoy,01>そんなに あせらなくても<CD>ボクが ここに来たからには<CF><D1>もう しゅっぱつ できるよ<CF><D1><@RL,Koji,01>UFOに のった ロボロボ団と<CD>ヘベレケはかせが 月にむかったって<CF><D1>ニュ-ス 本当か!?<CF><D1><@RL,ProbablyHasANameBoy,00>ああ 本当さ<CF><D1>本来なら 今 キミたちを 月に<CD>行かせるのは きけんだから<CF><D1>やめるベきなのかも しれない<CF><D1><@RL,Koji,01>じょうだんだろ!?<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,02>ぜったい 行く!!<CF><D1>あたしの ジャ-ナリストだましいが<CD>もえてるわっ!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,07>ぼくは 行かなきゃ ダメなんだ!<CD>ぜったいに!<CF><D1><@RL,ProbablyHasANameBoy,01>...そうだね<CD>今こそ キミたちの 力が<CF><D1>ひつようなのかも しれないな<CF><D1><@RL,ProbablyHasANameBoy,01>行ってくれるかい?<CD>キミの なかまたちと ともに<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,01>は はい!

Were you waiting for me?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,06>I-is the space rocket ready!?<CF><D1><@RL,ProbablyHasANameBoy,01>No need to be so on edge.<CF><D1>The fact that I'm here means that it's ready to depart anytime.<CF><D1><@RL,Koji,01>Is it true that the Rubberobo Gang rode a UFO to the moon?<CF><D1>And there's also Dr. Armond...<CF><D1><@RL,ProbablyHasANameBoy,00>Yes, correct on both accounts.<CF><D1>In fact, perhaps it's my role to stop you guys from going to the moon because of how dangerous it is.<CF><D1><@RL,Koji,01>You're joking, right!?<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,02>I'm definitely going!!<CF><D1>My journalist spirit won't be snuffed out!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,07>I have to go!
